0.title: Computer Science
0.text: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at Federal University of Paraná.

1.title: Scientific research
1.text: With the objective of developing a new firmware for the Very Small Size Soccer competition robot of the university's robot team, I programmed together with colleagues from the University's Robotics department, both the robot and its command transmission base using Arduino devices in C/C++.

2.title: Spro IT Solutions - Internship
2.text:
Development and maintenance of company's internal system business rules, in PHP.
CRUD using MySQL and Axios.
Frontend in HTML, CSS, Vue.js and jQuery.
Hybrid mobile app development with Flutter.

3.title: Spro IT Solutions - Junior Developer
3.text:
In addition to the previous function:
Database Management.
Creation of internal reports using Python and API requests.

about.title: About me
about.text: I'm Vinícius, a Computer Science student and developer working with PHP, MySQL and Flutter. During graduation I had the opportunity to learn programming from C and C++ to Java and Python. Doing my Scientific Initiation in robotics, I also got to know better about IoT devices and Arduino.

0.title: Codewars
0.desc:
Codewars is a website to train and develop logic and programming language skills with code practice challenges.
Here you will find a repository with my solutions.

1.title: Site
